author: supun
msg: handling runtime exceptions and throwables in extension deployment

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1914] change docbook unpack to include just the part needed, was including other things now in the merged uima-build-resources jar.  Also roll back version for respin.

author: fdmanana
msg: New replicator: avoid exceeding the maximum URL length (accepted by mochiweb) by trimming the number of possible ancestors passed in the atts_since query parameter.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-3309: Introduced stepwise option to let you traverse FTP servers as we did in Camel 2.0 to 2.4. When stepwise is disabled then Camel will not use any change directory.
